Reviews.Title: “No stay at backroom of hotel !!! just front room beside street.”

Reviews.Title: “Not a 4 star hotel at all”
Reviews.Author: Clamball
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights october dark outside am guessing inside darker expect lot standard price paying receptionists unhelpful efficient forever task travelling business receipts difficult provide hotel organised transfer airport hotel overpriced double booked wait forever airport pick passenger hotel complained reception lot shrugging recommend hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “Friendly hotel but noisy!!”
Reviews.Author: wsthame
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights cleaned day staff welcoming friendly pool gym refurbished themthe pool ok dip suppose breakfast plenty offer eg eggs cheese salami salad cereal bread cakes ect bad constant noise traffic passers stay ear plugs hotel base trains trams travel walk night

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Hotel Don't Waste Your Time or Money”

Reviews.Content: terrible stay recommend below summary hotel 1 pool dirty 2 staff didnt speak turkish friendly car service recommended hotel rip 3 breakfast minimal real hot food 4 gym extremley outdated staff charges 30 lire 20 th treadmill deal 5 minibar didnt exist fridge broken 6 outdated dirty noisy 7 bathroom outdated dirty 8 hotel location poor location ton street noise didnt feel safe location 9 price overpriced 10 airconditioning didnt exist hotel claims airconditioning 11 maidservice terrible poorly cleaned 12 cut fruit wouldnt provide
